text: Tower Hamlets Local Plan 133 CLEAN AND GREEN FUTURE Supporting text 13.98 London is an area of serious water stress, [19] but the overall demand for water is growing rapidly. Current building standards are insufficient to manage water scarcity. By 2044, the total difference between demand for water and available water bill be over 360 million litres of water per day, unless innovative solutions to address water supply and efficiency are delivered. [20]
